stories.title: Date Picker Selection
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a specific date from the date picker so that I can update my schedule accordingly

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When the user views the page, Then a label with text 'Select Date' should be visible
Given the date input is visible, When the user clicks on the date input, Then a calendar/date picker UI should be visible
Given the date picker is visible, When the user selects a date from the calendar, Then the input field should display the selected date in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format

stories.title: Date And Time Display Validation
stories.description: As a user, I want to see the current date and time formatted correctly so that I have an accurate reference

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When the user views the page, Then a label with text 'Date And Time' should be visible
Given the page is loaded, When the user views the date and time input, Then it should display the date in 'Month Day, Year Time' format
